title: PASS_KEYBOARD_INPUT_TO_SCALEFORM
content:
0xD1C7CB175E0129640xE9183D3A// PassKeyboardInputToScaleform
BOOL PASS_KEYBOARD_INPUT_TO_SCALEFORM(int scaleformHandle);Parameters:scaleformHandle: Scaleform movie handle returned by REQUEST_SCALEFORM_MOVIEReturns: Bool indicating if an input occurred this frame and was passed to the scaleform.Passes keyboard input to scaleform. You must call this native every frame. Once an input occurs, this native will return true and call SET_PC_KEY scaleform movie method with the key that has been inputted.The key parameter which is passed to the scaleform can also be: "BACKSPACE", "ENTER" or "\x1b" (Which is ESC).
This native is only used in web_browser.c as of game build 2944.
